Text.Page:
If Thulsa's really behind all this, it would explain the Ksharans we've gotten word of.

Arast at Dusk Camp said he saw a Ksharan near his post. Ksharans are undead made through argon artifice. They're definitely a threat.

Confirm their presence and report to Arast directly.

These are definitely Thulsan amulets. Thulsa's cast his net wide and gathered numerous allies to shield his work.

That explains why the unseelie are so bold. They think Thulsa will support them. Fools.

Thulsa's only loyalty is to himself.
I must know if the roads are safe. Please ensure they're clear or bring something tangible we can share with command.
